00048 class BL_DeformableGameObject : public KX_GameObject  
00049 {
00050 public:
00051     CValue*     GetReplica();
00052 
00053     double GetLastFrame ()
00054     {
00055         return m_lastframe;
00056     }
00057     Object* GetBlendObject()
00058     {
00059         return m_blendobj;
00060     }
00061     virtual void Relink(CTR_Map<CTR_HashedPtr, void*>*map)
00062     {
00063         if (m_pDeformer)
00064             m_pDeformer->Relink (map);
00065         KX_GameObject::Relink(map);
00066     };
00067     void ProcessReplica();
00068 
00069     BL_DeformableGameObject(Object* blendobj, void* sgReplicationInfo, SG_Callbacks callbacks) :
00070         KX_GameObject(sgReplicationInfo,callbacks),
00071         m_pDeformer(NULL),
00072         m_activeAct(NULL),
00073         m_lastframe(0.0),
00074         m_blendobj(blendobj),
00075         m_activePriority(9999)
00076     {
00077         m_isDeformable = true;
00078     };
00079     virtual ~BL_DeformableGameObject();
00080     bool SetActiveAction(class BL_ShapeActionActuator *act, short priority, double curtime);
00081 
00082     bool GetShape(vector<float> &shape);
00083     
00084     virtual void    SetDeformer(class RAS_Deformer* deformer);
00085     virtual class RAS_Deformer* GetDeformer()
00086     {
00087         return m_pDeformer;
00088     }
00089 
00090 public:
00091     
00092 protected:  
00093     
00094     RAS_Deformer        *m_pDeformer;
00095 
00096     class BL_ShapeActionActuator *m_activeAct;
00097     double      m_lastframe;
00098     Object*     m_blendobj;
00099     short       m_activePriority;
